title: Russian-Dutch Businessman Jailed 18 Months for Sanctions Violations
description: A Rotterdam court said that the unidentified businessman exported dual-use electronic goods to companies “closely related to” Russia’s arms and defense industry.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Russia Introduces New Currency Controls for Exiting Companies to Prop Up Ruble – FT
description: The new restrictions add to existing rules requiring foreign companies that seek to leave the country to sell their Russian assets at a discount and pay a “voluntary” contribution to the state budget.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Russia Arrests Suspect in Murder Plot Against Ex-Ukrainian Lawmaker
description: Oleg Tsaryov, a former Ukrainian lawmaker, was shot and badly wounded at his home in annexed Crimea on Friday.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Explosion Rocks Ammunition Plant in Central Russia
description: Authorities in the Perm region said no one was injured in the blast, which was said to not have impacted production at the ammunition plant.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Russia to Spend Funds From Seized Zelensky Apartment on Ukraine War
description: Crimea’s Kremlin-backed government auctioned off Zelensky’s confiscated apartment for 44.3 million rubles ($481,500) on Monday.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: France Arrests Russian Tycoon Kuzmichev in Tax, Sanctions Probe
description: Police reportedly carried out raids on several properties linked to Russian billionaire Alexei Kuzmichev, including his Paris home.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Chechnya's Kadyrov Orders Police to Shoot Protesters Amid Anti-Israeli Unrest
description: “Make three warning shots in the air, and if the person doesn’t obey the law afterward, make the fourth shot in the forehead,” Kadyrov said.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Kremlin Eases Quarantine for Access to Putin as Presidential Elections Approach
description: At the same time, personal meetings with Putin now hold greater significance for members of the establishment than ever amid the war in Ukraine.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
